subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Grant, whose previous season at Notre Dame ended in an academic-related suspension, has returned to average 17.3 points and 6.4 assists a game, drawing praise from Adrian Dantley.
snippet: Grant, whose previous season at Notre Dame ended in an academic-related suspension, has returned to average 17.3 points and 6.4 assists a game, drawing praise from Adrian Dantley.
